Package main

Class GameEnvironment

java.lang.Object
main.GameEnvironment
public class GameEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
Class where the main values and functionality of the game is stored

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GameEnvironment()
    Initialises the Game Environment

    • addMoney

      public boolean addMoney​(int change)
      Adds the given integer to the playerMoney. Negative integers are allowed to subtract.
      Parameters:
      change - the integer amount to change playerMoney by. Negative integers are allowed.
      Returns:
      true if the combination of playerMoney and the given integer change is > 0, false otherwise

    • initialise

      public void initialise()
      Initialises all of the game variables such as ships, items, trades on islands and sailing routes.

    • sail

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sail​(Route route) throws InsufficientDaysException, InsufficientFundsException, InsufficientRepairsException
      Generalised Sail function for use by command line and graphical UI environments
      Parameters:
      route - the route that will be sailed. Type: Route
      Returns:
      the array list of strings given by the tryEvent method in RandomEvent
      Throws:
      InsufficientDaysException - throws if there are not enough days left to take the route
      InsufficientFundsException - throws if the player does not have enough money to pay their sailors for the route
      InsufficientRepairsException
